author: Mettaton

text:
Sonic 1 will always be my favorite Sonic game (and I've played them all.)

I remember playing this the day it was released for the Genesis and thinking "Wow! The Genesis still has some life left in it!" Everything from the charismatic first stage to the beautiful and fun rotating bonus stages. It was the perfect package!

Sonic 2, CD, & 3 were all above average games, but I still prefer the original over those..
